Name: Its Simple, SHOOT
About the game: Its Simple, SHOOT! has you navigating the level utilizing a range of weapons and abilities to fight their enemies. Features quick and engaging gameplay, everything is focused around the core experience of combat in a neat little package, play for five minutes while getting a nice cup of coffee and then go about your day!
